channel.title: Exercises: Debugging :: Introduction to Web Dev
channel.description: Imagine we are running a space station. Your job is to evaluate the stationâ€™s code and fix any errors. The lives of the crew rest squarely upon your shoulders. Your directions from superiors: Launch the shuttle only if the fuel, crew and computer all check out OK. If a check fails, print that information to the console and scrub the launch. If all checks are successful, print a countdown to launch in the console. To get started, check out the exercises directory in javascript-projects/errors-and-debugging.
